name: Pavolia Reine | Hololive
description:
Formular for requests.

I am using AbyssOrangeMix3 (AOM3)

A weight at around ~0.7 is recommended, but other weights may also work in certain situations. Just play around with it and use what feels right to you.

The main prompts are "Reine" and "Pavolia Reine".

meta.prompt:
masterpiece, best quality, absurdres, perfect anatomy, cowboy shot, smile, parted lips, 
Pavolia Reine, 1girl, solo, short hair, grey hair, aqua eyes, bright pupils, looking at viewer, bangs, hair ornament, large breasts, jewelry, earrings, feather hair ornament, 
crop top, black crop top, see-through shirt, covered cleavage, pants, indoors, abs
